content.text: I'm single, and I enjoy cooking for myself. I'm proud of my sister and her growing family. My favorite websites are about home improvement and computer programming. I'm not sure how my family would react if I told them I was gay, but I know that I'm proud of who I am and who I love.
I am former military, and my time is too valuable for Comic Con. I wake up and greet my pets with a smile. I like to ride my bike. I am a wife.
What is your favorite thing to do on a bike?
I like to go for rides with my husband and our two dogs.
Sounds like a lot of fun! I love spending time with my family too.
What do you like to cook? I'm trying to get better at cooking, but I'm not very good at it yet.
I like to cook a lot of different things, but my specialty is Mexican food.
Mexican food is delicious! I could eat it every day.
Me too! I'm glad we have something in common.
